entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is introduced as entering the house with Fleur and Bill.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as hurrying into the house with Griphook and Bill.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is introduced as knowing what he was saying, and showing Harry a place to dig Dobby's grave.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as punishing those they had left behind at the Malfoy Manor in Harry's mind.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as having saved their lives, and Harry is grieving for him.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: The Malfoy Manor is mentioned as the place where Voldemort is punishing those they had left behind.

relationships.description: Griphook and Fleur entered the house together with Bill.
Bill showed Harry a place to dig Dobby's grave at the end of the garden.
Voldemort is punishing those they had left behind at the Malfoy Manor in Harry's mind.
Dobby saved Harry and his friends' lives, which is why Harry is grieving for him.
